name: Save A Soul
description:
Controls:

W/Up : jump (hold jump to jump higher)

A/Left : Move left

D/Right : Move Right

"Save A Soul" is a short platformer game about rekindling your love with your dead wife. You must pass all 5 levels and collect the 5 fragment of your wife's soul to win. Tough short, Save A Soul is fun yet challenging game to play.
